<file path="source.cpp">
#include "iostream"
#include "string"
#include "vector"
class Point {
    void Point()
    void Point(double x, double y)
    void Point(const Point& other)
    virtual void ~Point()
    double getX() const
    double getY() const
    void setX(double x)
    void setY(double y)
    virtual double distanceFromOrigin() const
};
class Point3D : public Point {
    void Point3D(double x, double y, double z)
    double getZ() const
    void setZ(double z)
    double distanceFromOrigin() const
};
template<typename T>
class Container {
    void Container(const T& value)
    const T& getValue() const
    void setValue(const T& value)
};
template<typename T>
T max(const T& a, const T& b) {
    {
            return (a > b) ? a : b;
        }
}
template<typename T>
T min(const T& a, const T& b) {
    {
            return (a < b) ? a : b;
        }
}
int main();
</file>
